        public boolean isAvailable(int sizeOfPax,
                           java.util.Date start,
                           java.util.Date end)
        Check if this particular table is available for that time slot and for that size of pax.
        Parameters:
        sizeOfPax - The minimum capacity required.
        start - Starting time of the reservation.
        end - Ending time of the reservation.
        Returns:
